prompts: Create a gooey, green Pokémon that can blend into its surroundings seamlessly.
Generate a Pokémon that resembles a sludge monster with a mischievous grin.
Show me a Pokémon that thrives in polluted urban environments, covered in grime.
Imagine a Pokémon that can ooze through tight spaces, with a body made of sludge.
Design a Pokémon that can absorb toxins and uses them to power its attacks.
Make a Pokémon that looks like a puddle of goo, with a big mouth and playful eyes.
Give me a Pokémon that has a slimy appearance, with a vibrant blue accent.
